alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 3:12PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Yuma County through 345 PM MST... At 312 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yuma to 9 miles south of Fortuna Foothills to 12 miles south of Ligurta. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Fortuna Foothills, Wellton, Blaisdell, Ligurta, and Araby. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 4 and 31. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 29 and 36. AZ Route 195 between mile markers 11 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
